title: Bollywood stars vote in Assembly elections 2019:Aamir Khan To Madhuri Dixit, Bollywood Celebs Step Out To Cast Their Vote In Assembly Elections 2019
text:
The assembly elections in Maharashtra as well as Haryana have opened. While BJP and its allies are eyeing to retain the power in both the states, the opposition, on the other hand, is hoping that the tables turn around this time.

The polling started at 7 am for 288 assembly seats in Maharashtra and 90 seats in Haryana. While it remains to be seen as to how many voters will turn out, Bollywood celebs can already be seen performing their duties.

From Aamir Khan and Ritesh Deshmukh to Madhuri Dixit and Lara Dutta, several B-Towns stars were among the first ones to cast their votes. In Haryana, wrestler Babita Phogat also exercised her vote in Charkhi Dadri constituency, where she is also contesting as a BJP candidate.

#1 Aamir Khan was one of the early risers. He posed for the paps!

Twitter

#2 Dia Mirza shared her selfie on Instagram!

Instagram

#3 "We have voted in #Latur.... I urge every voter to go out & vote," wrote Riteish as he shared a selfie with wife Genelia.

Instagram

Don't Miss 4.4 K SHARES 2.1 K SHARES 17.7 K SHARES 7 K SHARES 2.6 K SHARES

#4 Madhuri Dixit also posed for the paps after she cast her vote in Bandra.

Instagram

#5 Kunal Kemmu stepped out to vote along with his parents.

Instagram

#6 Lara Dutta also posted a selfie on social media after she cast her vote.

Instagram

#7 Veteran actor Prem Chopra and lyricist Gulzar also voted.

Mumbai: Veteran actor Prem Chopra and Director-lyricist Gulzar leave after casting their votes at a polling booth in Bandra(West) #MaharashtraElections2019 pic.twitter.com/Lj8zBms7EB — ANI (@ANI) October 21, 2019

The counting of votes will take place on Oct 24.

The polling started at 7 am for 288 assembly seats in Maharashtra and 90 seats in Haryana. While it remains to be seen as to how many voters will turn out, Bollywood celebs can already be seen performing their duties.
